Rule.Name: RCode
Rule.Description: Record code not in master table

Rule.Name: ECode
Rule.Description: Equipment code not in master table

Rule.Name: ACode
Rule.Description: Activity code not in master table

Rule.Name: FACodeZeroJobID
Rule.Description: First significant Activity code has a zero Job ID

Rule.Name: FACodeNotMRor@95
Rule.Description: First significant Activity code not MR or @95

Rule.Name: TSLess
Rule.Description: Timestamp is less than the prior record

Rule.Name: ITLess
Rule.Description: Impression Total is less than the prior record

Rule.Name: ITOutbound
Rule.Description: Impression Total not in range of 1-999 million
